original_text: ‘Make two trumpets from one piece of silver. Use a hammer to make them in the right shape. Make a noise with them to tell the people that they must come together. Also, use the trumpets to tell the people that they must move the camp.
korean_text: 은 나팔 둘을 만들되 두들겨 만들어서 그것으로 회중을 소집하며 진영을 출발하게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Make two trumpets from one piece of silver.
sentences.korean_translation: 은 한 조각으로 나팔 두 개를 만드세요.

sentences.original_text: Use a hammer to make them in the right shape.
Make a noise with them to tell the people
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들에게 알리기 위해 나팔 소리를 내세요.

sentences.original_text: Also, use the trumpets to tell the people
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 사람들에게 알리기 위해 나팔을 사용하세요.

sentences.original_text: that they must move the camp.
